title: How To Come Back Strong If You Take Your Foot Off The Gas With Zach Babcock
itunes:title: How To Come Back Strong If You Take Your Foot Off The Gas With Zach Babcock
description:
Zach is coming at you live from the airport with a quick message as he heads back home from a mastermind event. His biggest takeaway from the Lion’s Den Fly-in Friday, Mastermind, was to not let success go to your head. When we feel like we’ve made it, we tend to get comfortable, complacent, and we take our foot off the gas. A quick remedy for this is to get yourself around people that are all in on their dreams. Find a mentor, and never stop learning and leveling up.

If you haven’t signed up for the Underdog Empowerment newsletter yet, head over to... UnderdogEmpowerment.com/Subscribe. Zach is about to launch a new and improved newsletter where he plans to overdeliver on value. It will include things like a roadmap to launching and ranking your own podcast, how to grow your audience fast, and a blueprint for launching an event. It’s definitely not something you’ll want to miss.

 

What You’ll Learn:

  • What Zach learned at the Lion’s Den Mastermind event.
  • How to get back on track when you’ve become complacent.
  • Why you’ll want to sign up for the Underdog Empowerment newsletter.

 

Favorite Quote:

“Once you get some success coming in, don’t let that go to your head.” - Zach Babcock

 

How to Get Involved:

 

Get podcasting help here.

 

For more on how to grow your business, check out this episode. 


If you enjoyed this episode, head over and visit us on Apple Podcasts - leave a review and let us know what you thought! Your feedback keeps us going. Thanks for helping us spread the word!
